com.px100systems.data.core

Class StoredBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.px100systems.data.core.StoredBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SerializationAware
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Entity, PersistenceLogEntry

    public abstract class StoredBean
extends java.lang.Object
implements SerializationAware
    Base stored class. Every "non-transient" data structure passed to the data storage needs to extend it.
    Author:
    Alex Rogachevsky

        public boolean isSerializing()
        Is the bean is currently being serialzed or deserialized. Useful in overriden setters to avoid side effects during teh serialization phase, only when invoked normally.

        if the entity is being serialized or deserialized.
